contest-event.event-date:
May 12, 1928 D Skelmersdale Contest
Skelmersdale Contest 0 Test Piece Contest Skelmersdale Contest skelmersdale-contest
Recollections of Verdi
Skelmersdale, Lancashire, England, UK
Prizes - 1st £20 and cup, 2nd £10, 3rd £6, 4th £4, 5th £2. March contest - 1st Blackpool Excelsior, 2nd Atherton Public. 4th annual contest promoted by Skelmersdale Old Band. 7 bands competed.
Oct. 4, 2013, 2:37 p.m. July 14, 2016, 8:30 a.m.
1 Bickershaw Colliery William Halliwell
2 Irwell Bank James Moss
3 Blackpool Excelsior J. A. Greenwood
4 Wrightington & Heskin William Haydock
